original_title: Europe: Live! At Shepherd's Bush, London
overview: Live at Shepherd's Bush, London is a DVD by the Swedish hard rock band Europe. The main feature is a concert filmed at the O2 Shepherds Bush Empire in London, England on February 19, 2011. It was released on DVD and Blu-ray on June 15, 2011. Both the DVD and Blu-ray editions will include an extra CD that includes the same concert, except for three songs due to time constraints.
title: Europe: Live! At Shepherd's Bush, London
